mapper.sql: a.training_id AS "trainingId", a.title AS "title", a.vidio_type AS "vidioType", a.send AS "send", a.path AS "path", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TRAINING a
a.del_flag = '0'
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
AND a.vidio_type = #{vidioType}
AND a.send LIKE concat('%',#{send},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAINING( training_id, title, vidio_type, send, path, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{trainingId}, #{title}, #{vidioType}, #{send}, #{path}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAINING SET title = #{title}, vidio_type = #{vidioType}, send = #{send}, path = #{path}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE training_id = #{trainingId}
